channel.title: VSCode on Arto's dev time by-products

item.title: How to Set Up a Codeserver on Synology NAS
item.description: Have you ever missed the VSCode on your tablet? Now there is a solution: run the VSCode on your NAS at home and access it with a browser. That will be possible when you run the Codeserver Docker container on your NAS. Before you do this, you probably want to set up a wildcard certificate and a proxy server on your NAS. That will enable you to access the NAS outside your local network using HTTPS.
